meanings.sent1: She compleats her puzzle by placing the last piece.
meanings.sent2: He compleats his homework before dinner.
meanings.sent3: The chef compleats the dish with a sprinkle of herbs.
meanings.sent4: Her smile compleats the beauty of the sunset.
meanings.sent5: The final brushstroke compleats the painting.

meanings.sent1: He compleats building the model airplane.
meanings.sent2: She compleats her daily chores before bedtime.
meanings.sent3: The magician compleats his trick with a flourish.
meanings.sent4: The last stitch compleats the quilt.

meanings.definition: Bring to a state of full development.
meanings.sent1: Watering the plants compleats their growth.
meanings.sent2: The final touch compleats the project.
meanings.sent3: The sunlight compleats the ripening of the fruit.
meanings.sent4: Her guidance compleats his training as a chef.
meanings.sent5: The last ingredient compleats the recipe.
